channel.title: 1 hp..
channel.description: Any tips? LOL. I fell off the ladder from the elevator which got me down all the way to 1 HP and the game had already saved itself there. I can't find anything to help me right now. Currently, I've passed the creatures with long sticky tongues.

item.title: 1 hp..
item.dc:creator: St_Snake
item.description:
Ah, didn’t notice the extra saves below the auto saves. Thanks :3

Read full topic

item.title: 1 hp..
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
And if that doesn’t work, pause the game and look at the top right of the screen to see what map you’re on and go to it through the console. You’d have to restart the map with the default amounts of ammo/health and all that blah, but depending on how far it is it’s probably better than starting everything all over.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 hp..
item.dc:creator: Eklykti
item.description:
If the game was just auto-saved, you must have at least one more autosave and 2 quicksave files, so open the Load Game menu and choose from them.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 hp..
item.dc:creator: ToMang07
item.description:
Just go back to the last saved point.

Read full topic
